# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a switch toggle style.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t call this initializer directly. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToggleStyle/switch] static variable to create this style:

```swift
Toggle("Enhance Sound", isOn: $isEnhanced)
    .toggleStyle(.switch)
```
title: init()
